attributes.additional_details:
That the Government of the United Kingdom carry out a full impartial and proper investigation and if proven a prosecution against
1. Mr Gerry Adams (Former Irish Republican Army)
2. Mr Martin McGuiness (Former Irish Republican Army)
For their parts in prosecuting a reign of terror against both the 'Security Forces' engaged by HM Government to keep the peace and the civilian population in Northern Ireland, between the years 1969 and 2007, the duration of Operation Banner.

It is time for justice for the servicemen and victims of Irish terrorism.
